Directed by Rebecca Thomas. Haifaa Al-Mansour. Justin Benson. Aaron Moorhead.

Written by Helen Leigh. Helen Leigh. Daniel Powell. Marc Sollinger. Rebecca Sonnenshine. Rebecca Sonnenshine. Rebecca Sonnenshine. Evan Bleiweiss. Michael Narducci. Paul Harris Boardman. Bobak Esfarjani.

Cast Dina Shihabi( Melody Pendras ) . Evan Jonigkeit( Samuel ) . Julia Chan( Anabelle ) . Ariana Neal( Jess ) . Matt McGorry( Mark Higgins ) . Martin Donovan( Virgil Davenport ) . Kate Eastman( Tamara Stefano ) . Charlie Hudson III( Steven Turner ) . Kristin Griffith( Cassandra Wall ) . Eden Marryshow( John Smith ) . Jacqueline Antaramian( Bobbi ) . Jaxon Rose Moore( Emily Turner ) . Trayce Malachi( Young Dan Turner ) . Sol Miranda( Beatriz Reyes ) . Georgina Haig( Iris Vos ) . Martin Sola( Father Russo ) . Shay Guthrie( Callie ) . Allen( Eliot ) . James Allen Washington( Sanctuary Dancer ) . Nick Pasqual( Peter ) . Cherie McClain( Gloria Francis ) . Darbey Rose Waters( Sanctuary Dancer ) . Tony Bingham( Ross Bauer ) . Arjun Kumar( Visser Tenant ) . Daina Griffith( Gabby ) . Nupur Charyalu( Visser Tenant ) . Debbie Norrell( Visser Tenant ) . Haley Muir( The Maid ) . Jamie Agnello( Visser Tenant ) . Mandy Simpson( Female Passerby ) . Sean McGee( Male Bystander ) . Daniel Johnson( Visser Tenant (uncredited) ) . Johnna Leary( Visser Tenant (uncredited) ) . Cotter Smith( Nicolas (uncredited) ) . Darius Fraser( Calvin (uncredited) ) . David H. Holmes( Paul (uncredited) ) . Daniel Lamont( Art Gallery Owner (uncredited) ) . Roger Petan( Driver (uncredited) ) . Patrick Klein( Pedestrian (uncredited) ) . Ellen Kotzin( VOS Member (uncredited) ) . Hilda Ivette Rodriguez( Pedestrian (uncredited) ) . Dave Edmonds( Bartender (uncredited) ) . Robert Kwiatkowski( EMT (uncredited) ) . C.J. Lee( Art Gallery Attendee (uncredited) ) . Eric Sharpe( Police Officer (uncredited) ) . Melessie Clark( Katie (uncredited) ) . Dan Gradijan( Patient (uncredited) ) . AilÃ©n Videla Ortiz( Array (uncredited) ) . Leon Gray III( Patient (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Rebecca Sonnenshine. Paul Harris Boardman. Michael Clear. Antoine Douaihy. Rob Hackett. Amanda Kay Price. Marc Sollinger. Rebecca Thomas. James Wan.

Status Finished (2022–2022)
